cab.content: I S3 gHtannjd jVlaiesty/s GovernmentMilitary Secret.1179oij, Foreign and Political Department, to Secretary of State for India,19th November 1919.(Received 26th.)274 A. North-West Frontier. Representative jirga of Tochi Wazirs accepted,terms on 17th November. Only absentees were too insignificant subsections whichwere late for jirga and were expected to come in on 18th. Some security, riflesalready handed over and part fine paid.
